channel.title: Avery Elle on Nancy's Creative Mess
channel.description: Recent content in Avery Elle on Nancy's Creative Mess

item.title: *Time Out Challenges #220*
item.description: I’m back as part of the design team at Time Out Challenges with a new challenge to get your creative juices flowing! This is one of two non-clean and simple blogs that I design for so let your creativity flow as much as you want with these challenges! For the next two weeks, we want to see you create your own backgrounds! We have an awesome prize from Stamplorations available to be won as well!

item.title: *Floral Best Wishes*
item.description: Why do the months of June, July and August seem to fly by while December, January and February go by at a snails pace? I am in awe that summer in already half over! I know there’s still lots of warm sunny weather to come, but it feels like it’s going by so fast! I saw a card using this layout on Pinterest and wanted to play with it. For some it would still be considered clean and simple, but for others it is not.

item.title: *AAACards #213*
item.description: It’s time for another clean and simple challenge with the team at AAACards. Our challenge for the next two weeks is “small and few” with the optional twist of Easter or Spring. I hope you’ll play along with us by sharing your clean and simple creations with us HERE! I did a quick and easy card thanks to this wonderful Lawn Fawn strip of flowers. I stamped them, coloured them quickly with a few spring colours of Copics, stamped my greeting and then put the flowers on the card with some foam adhesive.
